content.description: This is the right most route on the West Side.  Located 15 feet to the right of Friday Night Lights.
content.location: Start up some low angle sections to reach the first bolt.  Stem and pull on steep terrain to reach and pass (crux) the 2nd bolt. Continue up and right to the anchor.

content.description: Left side route on the West face.  Start on the rock  that is below the right side of the bolt. Clip the first bolt and start climbing. Crux at the start will pull you onto the slab. Move past the second bolt with a few left hand pinches on dark brown rock. Continue past third bolt to the anchor.
content.location: 30 feet up and left from the start of Necessary Summit. Scramble up and below from below the first bolt.

content.description: Second route from the left of the west face. Climbs up the left side of the biggest slab chunk near the right side of the West face. Move right and left past the first bolt. Crux near the bottom half. Continue on the slab above. Extra points if you stand on top after reaching the anchor. Actually, it's necessary!
content.location: 3rd route from the right on the low angle chunk of slab.

content.description: Crux is passing the 2nd bolt. Use whatever rock is in reach, nothing is off limits for this climb. Anchor is on the block on top of the slab.
content.location: Starts 10 feet left of Necessary Summit.  Climbs up a separate loaf that is immediately to the left of the big slab chunk.

content.description: Start 10 feet right of Necessary Summit. At the top, move to either anchor on the left or right.
content.protection: 6 bolts and 2 bolt anchor. Can share anchor with either route to the left or right.
content.location: Located in between Necessary Summit and Friday Night Lights. Shares anchor.

content.description: Right side route on the big chunk of slab. Climbs near the blunt arete.  Crux is near the bottom passing bolt two.
content.location: Right side route on the west face. Start down low and belay from the flat sandy area.
